title: Champion and skins transfer
body:
Is there any way for all my champions and skins to be transfered from my one account to the other. I dont use my old account but have spent a ton of money on it and dont want to lose it.
Help?

replies.body: [**Transferring content**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751934-General-Account-Information#h3q1) like champions and skins between two accounts isn't something we can do. If you want to start using a secondary account on top of your original one, you'll have to rebuy that stuff for the new account.
